headlines.description: Erling Haaland and Phil Foden both struck hat tricks as Manchester City routed Manchester United in a 6-3 win at the Etihad on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Haaland, Foden hit hat tricks as City rout Utd 6-3

headlines.description: Leeds United managed to hang on for a 0-0 draw at home to Aston Villa despite playing much of the second half with 10 men.
headlines.shortLinkText: Dogged 10-man Leeds secure 0-0 with Aston Villa
